TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV4Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 控制消息协议 IPv4 (ICMPv4) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for IPv4 (ICMPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 是一套错误和用于 Internet 协议版本 4 的信息性消息。ICMPv4 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4. IETF RFC 792 中定义了 ICMP 版本 4。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 此类由方法以返回 ICMPv4 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPv4 traffic information. ## Examples 下面的示例显示当前 ICMPv4 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以调用仅由派生自的类。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AddressMaskRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long AddressMaskRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“地址掩码应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“地址掩码应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 地址掩码请求和答复消息用于确定在本地子网的子网掩码的比特数。Address Mask Request and Reply messages are used to determine the number of bits in the subnet mask for the local subnet. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到的计算机均数据包的源由于以下原因导致：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机无法找到路由到的目标地址。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 通过管理方式禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 目标地址不可用。The destination address is unreachable. - 目标端口不可用。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法到达目标的消息可以发送到的计算机均数据包的源由于以下原因导致：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机无法找到路由到的目标地址。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 通过管理方式禁止与目标地址的通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙会阻止数据包的传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 目标地址不可用。The destination address is unreachable. - 目标端口不可用。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包的协议的任何侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. - ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“回送应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Echo Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“回送应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回显请求和回显答复消息允许计算机从网络上的远程计算机中请求了 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#21)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#21)]

public: abstract property long MessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 消息将发送错误以及关于使用 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPv4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV4 消息将发送错误以及关于使用 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 发送的数据包的信息进行通信。ICMPV4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“参数问题”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Parameter Problem messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机时，将发送参数问题消息或路由器在处理数据包标头，如遇到了无效的 IPv4 选项或无效的下一步的标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#27)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#27)]

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机计算机时，将发送参数问题消息或路由器在处理数据包标头，如遇到了无效的 IPv4 选项或无效的下一步的标头类型的内容时遇到问题。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 重定向消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送重定向消息以通知主机计算机的目标地址的更好地路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 重定向消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由器发送重定向消息以通知主机计算机的目标地址的更好地路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当因输出队列中的空间不足而已丢弃数据包，则会发送抑制来源消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达过快要处理，目标计算机还可以发送源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 源抑制消息是对主机的请求削减此时它将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesSent As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当因输出队列中的空间不足而已丢弃数据包，则会发送抑制来源消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达过快要处理，目标计算机还可以发送源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 源抑制消息是对主机的请求削减此时它将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“超时”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制用于确定可以将其转发之前会丢弃该消息的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 转发数据包时，每次其跃点的限制值将减少 1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时，或当路由器接收其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，会丢弃该数据包和数据包的源收到指示初始的跃点限制太小或数据包陷入 rou 的时间超过消息做到的一循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“超时”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制用于确定可以将其转发之前会丢弃该消息的次数。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 转发数据包时，每次其跃点的限制值将减少 1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制为零时，或当路由器接收其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，会丢弃该数据包和数据包的源收到指示初始的跃点限制太小或数据包陷入 rou 的时间超过消息做到的一循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimestampRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimestampRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“时间戳应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“时间戳应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间戳请求消息会导致接收端的计算机发送时间戳答复回原始计算机。A Timestamp Request message causes the receiving computer to send a timestamp reply back to the originating computer. 这些消息用于度量在网络上的传输速度。These messages are used to measure the transmission speed on a network. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#28)]
